title: FS: American Beauty No Frame & Other T206 Premiums Hand Cut, etc.
author: MW1

posts.post_title: FS: American Beauty No Frame & Other T206 Premiums Hand Cut, etc.
posts.post_content:
The first email (send to: [url]bmwsports@msn.com[/url]) confirms a purchase with 24 hours to pay with Paypal, check or money order for each of the lots below.

A confirmation will be sent to each buyer. Be sure to include your shipping address in the PayPal notes section if paying with that method.

Free insured USPS First Class shipping with Signature Confirmation is included.

Please DO NOT post, email, or message through the Net54 system in order to try and reserve items.  Confirm via email as given above.

Lot #1: Three (3) well centered T206 Major League Players [Price: $175] - [URL="http://www.bmwcards.net/net54/t206hoblitzellfront.jpg"]front[/URL];[URL="http://www.bmwcards.net/net54/t206hoblitzellback.jpg"]back[/URL]
T206 Sweet Caporal Cigarettes Doc Hoblitzell, Cincinnati (Series of 350)
T206 Sweet Caporal Cigarettes Al Shaw, St. Louis Nationals (Series of 150)
T206 Sweet Caporal Cigarettes Bill Shipke, Washington (Series of 150)

Lot #2: Oversized and Hand Cut T206 Sweet Caporal Cigarettes Wilbur Good (Goode), Cleveland (Series of 150) [Price: $149] - [URL="http://www.bmwcards.net/net54/t206goodefront.jpg"]front[/URL];[URL="http://www.bmwcards.net/net54/t206goodeback.jpg"]back[/URL]

Lot #3: T206 American Beauty George Mullin Batting, Detroit (Series of 350 with No Frame) [Price: $175] - [URL="http://www.bmwcards.net/net54/t206mullinfront.jpg"]front[/URL];[URL="http://www.bmwcards.net/net54/t206mullinback.jpg"]back[/URL]

Lot #4: T206 American Beauty Jake Pfiester (Pfeister) Throwing, Chicago Cubs (Series of 460) [Price: $175] - [URL="http://www.bmwcards.net/net54/t206pfeisterfront.jpg"]front[/URL];[URL="http://www.bmwcards.net/net54/t206pfeisterback.jpg"]back[/URL]
